Introduction

Jihoon is a South Korean singer and rapper under Pledis Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group TWS and a former member of the pre-debut boy group Trainee A. Jihoon debuted with TWS on January 22, 2024, with the release of their first mini album, "Sparkling Blue."
